text: Province no. 2 () of Nepal was one of the Seven Province of Nepal established by the country's new constitution of 20 September 2015, comprising Eight districts, namely, Saptari, Parsa, Sarlahi, Bara, Siraha, Dhanusha, Rautahat and Mahottari. There are many categorized monuments sites in Province no. 2.Here is district wise List of Monuments which is in the Province no. 2. == Province no. 2 == Wikimedia Commons has media related to Cultural heritage monuments in Province no. 2. * List of Monuments in Saptari District * List of Monuments in Parsa District * List of Monuments in Sarlahi District * List of Monuments in Bara District * List of Monuments in Siraha District * List of Monuments in Dhanusha District * List of Monuments in Rautahat District == Reference == ==See also== Province no. 2 Category:Province No. 2
title: List of monuments in Province no. 2
